details.heading: Bio
details.name: Shayan Ur Rehman
details.description: I am an ambitious Software Developer with 3+ years of experience specializing in developing mobile and web applications within the fintech, ecommerce, networking, and human resource domains. My adaptability to new technologies and strong problem-solving and interpersonal skills enables me to deliver high-quality, scalable software solutions. I am seeking a challenging opportunity to leverage my skills and knowledge to drive organizational success.

experience.title: Frontend Developer (Fullstack)
experience.company: Loop Financial Services by Xfoil Pvt Ltd
experience.description: Led migration to Vite, upgraded Ant Design, and worked on payments, user management, and invoicing modules. Migrated CI/CD from GitLab to GitHub Actions.

experience.title: React Developer
experience.description: Integrated APIs via Redux, built reusable hooks, and implemented pixel-perfect UIs with React Hook Form. Developed an image gallery and avatar animations.

experience.title: MERN Stack Developer (Remote)
experience.description: Built reusable components, integrated APIs with Redux, and implemented routing with React Suspense in a responsive web design.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Worked on an e-commerce platform, integrated APIs, added offline support, and developed POS and inventory management modules with Redux.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.university: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focus on AI and Machine Learning. Courses in Sofwarre Design, Software Engineering and Database Systems and Theory of Computation.
